body_html: @carpodaster is it better to actually delete the code rather than comment it out? I could drop a quick rake note in there so we can easily track why it was commented out in the first place, but I'm not sure if it's possible to add this to views 🙈

body: @carpodaster is it better to actually delete the code rather than comment it out? I could drop a quick `rake note` in there so we can easily track why it was commented out in the first place, but I'm not sure if it's possible to add this to views :see_no_evil:
